StormVZ Ltd. is a new company based in the UK, we aim to provide you with enterprise grade services at affordable prices. 

★★★ **Previous Benchmarks** ★★★
http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/4686/stormvz-benchmark
http://serverbear.com/benchmark/2012/09/08/8cLwxFDimRuKCvZL

★★★ **PROMOTION** ★★★
Enter promo code: "**LAUNCH**" to get 50% off first month (non recurring - available for monthly billing only)
This is the perfect way to test our services for a month if you wish at incredibly low price!

In addition, we are upgrading all VPS's port speed to 1GBPS from 100mbps upon submitting ticket.

★★★ **NETWORK** ★★★
Our UK node(s) are located at Hampshire, England (UK)
Test IP: 109.200.26.19
Test File: http://109.200.26.19/100mb.bin
More Info: http://stormvz.com/network.html

★★★ **FEATURES ON ALL PLANS** ★★★
- 1 IPv4 Included (Up to 5 available on order form - £1.25/each ($2.00*)
- 1 IPv6 Included
- Inbuilt Control Panel & SolusVM Back Up Panel
- OpenVZ -32Bit & 64Bit - CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu & Fedora (TurnkeyLinux available on request)
- Full Root Access
- Instant Setup
- No Contract Terms
- 5 Day Money Back
- Instant Upgrade/Downgrade From Billing Panel

★★★ **PLANS** ★★★
**VPS #1**
2 CPU Cores
10GB 15K SAS Disk Space
500GB Bandwidth
256MB Guaranteed RAM
512MB vSwap RAM
£3.00/mo
First month - £1.50
**<a href="https://stormvz.net/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=1">Order Now</a>**

Other plans available at: http://stormvz.com/vps.html
Promo applicable to all plans. 

★★★ **PAYMENT ACCEPTED** ★★★
We currently accept PayPal & Google Checkout, payments available in USD & GBP.
